## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r}
activityData<-read.csv("activity.csv")
dim(activityData)
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

```{r}
totals<-ddply(activityData,.(date),summarise,steps=sum(steps,na.rm=F))
meanSteps<-mean(totals$steps)
meanSteps
```

## What is the average daily activity pattern?

```{r}
intervalTotals<-ddply(activityData,.(interval),steps=sum(steps,na.rm=F))
q<-ggplot(data=intervalTotals,aes(x=date,y=steps))+geom_point(size=2)
q
```
